entity.name: Portr
entity.description: Portr is an open-source self-hosted ngrok alternative designed for teams. Portr lets you expose your local HTTP, TCP and websocket services to the internet.

projects.name: Portr
projects.description: Portr is an open-source self-hosted ngrok alternative designed for teams. Portr lets you expose your local HTTP, TCP and websocket services to the internet.

plans.name: Developer Compensation
plans.description: This will cover the cost of one engineer working part-time on building Portr. This includes the cost of the server for setting up and running a playground.

plans.name: Show your support
plans.description: Pay anything you wish to show your goodwill for the project.
